activation.condition: Spend a Resolve Point to create a technomagical duplicate of a technological weapon you can observe within 30 feet

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.sobLlAGQkmWcFBFx]{Magic Hack}

Once per day as a move action, you can spend a Resolve Point to create a technomagical duplicate of a technological weapon you can observe within 30 feet. The duplicate appears in your empty hand or on the ground in your space, as an exact copy of the weapon observed, though no fusions or extra effects are duplicated. It does not contain ammunition, though if the device uses a battery, it is half full and can be used only to power the weapon. This device canâ€™t be sold, and it functions for a number of rounds equal to your Intelligence modifier before dissipating into nothing.
